Class Initialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Initialiser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HotelInitialiser, RoomInitialiser

    public abstract class Initialiser
extends java.lang.Object
    The Initialiser class acts as the superclass for the HotelInitialiser and RoomInitialiser classes It reads hotel and room data from a specified file, creates appropriate Hotel and Room objects and stores them in a list to be further processes later on
    Author:
    20241135
